text: (pinnar, iraivan atamai nokki) ‘‘atame! Nir umatu manaiviyutan iccolaiyil vacittirum. Ninkal iruvarum virumpiya itattilellam (cenru virumpiyavarraiyellam) puciyunkal. Eninum, inta marattin camipattilkuta ninkal cellatirkal. (Avvaru cenral) atanal unkalukku ninkale tinkilaittuk kontavarkalaka akivituvirkal'' (enru kurinan)
